content.title: AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs for Librarians
content.details: AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs for Librarians, launched by the All India Council for Technical Education, aims to provide financial assistance in conducting training for Librarians to prepare them for being successful and effective in a knowledge society.
benefits: Financial assistance for conducting training programs
Maximum total expenditure for one training program is ₹ 3,00,000/-
AICTE will release a grant of ₹ 1,50,000/- to Technical university for the training program
documents_required: List of resource persons invited with full address, contact details, topics etc.
List of participants attended the training program
Copy of question paper and mark sheet for the test conducted at the end of program
Minimum five photographs and a video CD of selected sessions

faqs.question: What is AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs For Librarians scheme?
faqs.answer: AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs For Librarians provides training to the librarians to prepare them for being successful and effective in a knowledge society.

faqs.question: Who manages this scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE).

faqs.question: Mention one of the main benefits of the scheme.
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to the technical university for the training program.

faqs.question: What should be the criteria of the institution?
How many training program can be conducted by the universities?
faqs.answer: The university shall conduct one such training program in a financial year.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the training program?
faqs.answer: The training program will be of five (5) days.

faqs.question: Minimum how many participants need to join this program?
faqs.answer: Minimum 25-30 participants need to join this program.

faqs.question: Who will act as the facilitator for the operation of the training program?
faqs.answer: The university will act as the facilitator for the operation of the training program.
